creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a refrigerator with a radio on top of it at right; small plaque with bird on wall in ULQ with a calendar hanging below it, turned to July 1979
inscription: on back in pencil: Refrigerator, Radio / Ann Arbor
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Kitchen, Ruth's Home, Pomona Road, Ann Arbor, MI
